Player History
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1965, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Drafted in 4th round, 80th overall pick, by Boston in 1968...
Injured on 5/2/1970 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/15/1970 with a Stiff Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/28/1970 with a Bruised Finger, out for 2 days...
Injured on 9/2/1971 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/26/1977 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/14/1977 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit (triple) on 5/8/1978, off Don Eddy (CHW)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/20/1978, off Ken Brett (BAL)...
Released by Boston on 9/8/1982...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/16/1983 to a 2-year deal worth $482,222 per year...
